name: Red VS Blue
description:
Red VS Blue! This game was created for my Grade 10 Computer Engineering Course. I hoped to make something my friends and I could play while we were bored in class on the same computer. It features four levels and split screen action. Enjoy!

Controls: Player 1

Move Up (W) Move Down (S) Move Left (A) Move Right (D) Shoot Up (T) Shoot Down (G) Shoot Left (F) Shoot Right (H)

Controls: Player 2

Move Up (ArrowUp) Move Down (ArrowDown) Move Left (ArrowLeft) Move Right (ArrowRight) Shoot Up (Numpad5) Shoot Down (Numpad2) Shoot Left (Numpad1) Shoot Right (Numpad3)
